home.title: Hybrid Wind–Solar Power, Ducted Turbines & PSG Generators
home.subtitle: High-efficiency DCR wind turbines, Planetary Synchronous Generators, flexible PV, EV chargers, and green hydrogen systems.
home.cta_band: Build your clean‑energy system with GIES.

feature.dcr_txt: Up to 2× energy vs. open‑bladed turbines of same size, low noise/vibration, compact.
feature.psg_txt: Brushless, compact, high-efficiency generator/motor design with wide RPM and power ranges.
feature.greenH2_txt: Modular wind‑solar‑powered electrolyzer systems for clean hydrogen production.

products.title: Products
products.subtitle: Order components and complete systems. International shipping available.

cart.title: Your Cart
cart.note: For B2B orders and freight quotes, submit your cart and our team will contact you with final shipping & lead time.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: From yacht electrification to commercial EV charging and utility‑scale wind‑solar plants.
services.yachts_txt: Install DCR wind turbines and flexible PV to supply vessels from green sources.
services.pmMotors: Installing PM Motors for EV Yachts
services.pmMotors_txt: High‑efficiency BLDC/PSG motors from 500 W to 100 kW (24–144 V DC).
services.convertDiesel_txt: Replace aging diesel engines with clean, low‑maintenance electric propulsion.
services.hybridCharger_txt: Ready‑to‑install stations with battery storage; options for low‑wind sites.
services.greenH2_txt: Modular electrolyzer stations powered by DCR wind towers and PV arrays.
services.hybridPlants_txt: Hexagonal turbine arrays for 30% higher efficiency; scalable and low maintenance.

education.title: GIES Education
education.subtitle: Hands‑on training: assembly, maintenance, winding, simulation (JMAG) and more.
education.item1: Access to lab equipment and testing

about.title: About GIES
about.subtitle: UAE‑based engineers inventing compact, efficient renewable solutions.
about.txt1: We design and manufacture PSG generators, ducted counter‑rotating wind turbines, green EV chargers and modular green hydrogen stations.
about.txt2: Our patented RCPMG (2021158131) and next‑gen PSG deliver high power density and >95% efficiency in compact footprints.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your project. We ship worldwide.
